en.html: Remember to THINK and work carefully so that TED can tell whether or not you need extra help. If you answer quickly and incorrectly, you will be asked more questions than if you answer carefully and correctly.

en.text: Each experiment set up by some other students might either be a good or a bad experiment.

__novar.SSML: Each experiment set up by some other students might either be a good or a bad experiment.

en.text: A 'good' experiment will let you figure out if the variable you are testing really does or really does not make a difference. We will ask you if you think each experiment is a good or bad experiment.
